TarzanUtilities::query_to_array ( $  qs  ) 

Convert a query string into an associative array.

Multiple, identical keys will become an indexed array. ?key1=value&key1=value&key2=value

Array ( [key1] => Array ( [0] => value [1] => value )

[key2] => value )

public

Parameters:
array $qs (Required) Query string to convert.
Returns:
array Associative array of keys and values.
